goals__remit: Nordic Financial Unions (NFU) is an organisation for co-operation between trade unions that organise employees in the banking, finance and insurance sectors in the five Nordic countries. At present, seven trade unions are affiliated to the NFU; two in Denmark, one in Finland, two in Sweden, and one in each Iceland and Norway. Through these trade unions, NFU represents 150 000 employees in the Nordic financial markets.
